title: IC-XML Information Exchange Package Documentation (IEPD)
headertxt: Ion Channelâ€™s Software EVidence Archive (SEVA) establishes compatibility with all XML defined standards by using National Information Exchange Model (NIEM) design rules to integrate XML schema for SPDX, CyloneDX, and IC-TDF to enable security markings and create trusted reports suitable for automated transfer through cross-domain gateways, and trust-less encrypted distribution.
